changeSet.sql: create table current_limits ( id uuid primary key, spent_amount jsonb not null, limit_amount jsonb not null, tag varchar(64) not null, timespan varchar(32) not null, period_start date not null, valid_until timestamp with time zone not null, created_at timestamp with time zone not null ); create index current_limits_tag_valid_until_idx on current_limits ( tag, valid_until )
